trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZF018_03477_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The hasty hunter remembers how helpful you can be.
TEXT_LUCKZF018_03477_TODO_00<tab>Slay a cracked Ronkan doll for its core.
TEXT_LUCKZF018_03477_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the core to the hasty hunter.
TEXT_LUCKZF018_03477_FANOWHUNTER03477_000_000<tab>A welcome sight in my hour of need.
TEXT_LUCKZF018_03477_FANOWHUNTER03477_000_001<tab>As you know, a number of our stone sentinels have turned against us. But if they can be slain, they may yet serve to protect these ruins.
TEXT_LUCKZF018_03477_FANOWHUNTER03477_000_002<tab>We lack the knowledge to build more, but it is possible to use their parts to repair those that yet remain.
TEXT_LUCKZF018_03477_FANOWHUNTER03477_000_003<tab>If you could slay even a single sentinel and bring me its core, that is all I require to begin my work.
TEXT_LUCKZF018_03477_FANOWHUNTER03477_000_004<tab>I only require a single core to begin my work.
TEXT_LUCKZF018_03477_FANOWHUNTER03477_000_012<tab>As I said before, we lack the knowledge to build the sentinels. And this is perhaps the most difficult piece to replicate.
TEXT_LUCKZF018_03477_FANOWHUNTER03477_000_013<tab>So long as their cores can be retrieved, we can prolong the life of those we yet have.
